subSubSection.paragraph:
Zamarada melpomene Oberthür, 1912: 258
, 350, pl. 152 fig. 1460. Locus typicus: Cameroon : Johann-Albrechts Ĥhe, Station Kamerun, 1898 (L. Conradt) ( Holotype Ƌ in NHMUK).

Zamarada melpomene tragodica Prout, 1934: 130
. Locus typicus: Tanganyika T.
[ Tanzania ]: Morogoro , 1931–32 ( J.A.J. Thompson ) ( Holotype Ƌ in NHMUK )
.

Genetic data. BIN : BOLD :AAA9758 (n=6 from Ethiopia ; n=23 from Cameroon , Guinea , Ghana , Sierra Leone , Nigeria , Gabon , Democratic Republic of the Congo , Uganda ; maximum variation 1.3%). Nearest species:
Z. psectra Fletcher, 1974
(4.0%).

Distribution. Angola , Cameroon , Central Africa Republic, Democratic Republic of the Congo , Côte d’Ivoire , Equatorial Guinea , Ethiopia , Gabon , Ghana , Guinea , Kenya , Malawi , Nigeria , Sierra Leone , Tanzania , Togo , Uganda , Zimbabwe ( Herbulot 1954 ; Fletcher 1974 ; Sircoulomb 2007 ; Joli et al . 2008).

Remarks. In male genitalia, the valva is very variable. The figured male genitalia of
Z. micropomene Aarvik & Bjørnstad, 2007
from Tanzania seem to fall into the intraspecific variation of
Z. melpomene
. However, since no further specimens of
Z. micropomene
nor DNA barcodes of the type specimens of
melpomene , tragodica
and
micropomene
are currently available, this question remains open for future study.
